original_text: And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.
korean_text: 희롱을 다 한 후 자색 옷을 벗기고 도로 그의 옷을 입히고 십자가에 못 박으려고 끌고 나가니라

sentences.original_text: And when they had mocked him
they took off the purple from him
and put his own clothes on him
and led him out to crucify him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 십자가에 못 박으려고 밖으로 끌고 나갔다
